product_name: Mountaineers Books Winter Hikes of Western Washington - Deck of Cards
long_description: Collect 'em, trade 'em and put 'em on the fridge after you've hiked 'em! Author: Craig Romano. Deck of cards with hard case; color photographs. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2009. Features 50 hikes for all abilities; each card features a description, mileage, contacts, difficulty, elevation gain, directions and a topographic map. Hikes are numbered 1 to 50 and color-coded by region. Author includes winter hiking tips and basics. Deck measure 6 x 4.5 in.
short_description: Collect 'em, trade 'em and put 'em on the fridge after you've hiked 'em! Winter Hikes of Western Washington is sure to please winter hiking enthusiasts.
